rules_text:
Whenever Twilight Vagabond attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Cybersoul {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}: Transform this. Each artifact you tap while activating pays for {1}. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2: {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Traveler of Dawn: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
